<style>
  .announce-on-nav{
    position: fixed;
    left: 50%;
    top: var(--ann-center-y, 48px);
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 9999;

    display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
    text-align: center; gap: .4em;

    color: #07315c;
    font: 500 0.95rem/1.3 system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;
    min-height: 44px; padding: 1em 2.5em .9em;  /* ç»™å³ä¸Šè§’æŒ‰é’®ç•™ç©ºé—´ */
    border: 1px solid #bfd9ff; border-radius: .5em;
    box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.18);
    white-space: normal; pointer-events: auto;

    background:
      linear-gradient(90deg,#0061ff 0%,#60efff 45%,#00f5a0 100%) top/100% 4px no-repeat,
      #eaf3ff;

    position: relative;
    opacity: 0; transform-origin: center;
    /* åˆå§‹ç”¨ scale(.92) + é€æ˜ï¼Œé…åˆ JS åˆ‡æ¢ç±»è§¦å‘å±•å¼€åŠ¨ç”» */
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(.92);
  }

  .announce-on-nav .icon{ width:22px; height:22px; margin-bottom:.3em; }
  .announce-on-nav .ann-text{ font-size:1rem; font-weight:600; }
  .announce-on-nav .ann-link a{
    font-weight:600; color:#c46800; text-decoration:none;
  }
  .announce-on-nav .ann-link a:hover{ text-decoration:underline; }

  /* å…³é—­æŒ‰é’®ï¼šå³ä¸Šè§’æ‚¬æµ® */
  .announce-on-nav .ann-close{
    position:absolute; top:6px; right:6px;
    inline-size:26px; block-size:26px;
    border:0; border-radius:50%; background:transparent; color:inherit;
    font-size:1.1rem; line-height:1; cursor:pointer;
  }
  .announce-on-nav .ann-close:hover{ background:rgba(0,0,0,.08); }

  /* â€”â€” åŠ¨ç”»çŠ¶æ€ â€”â€” */
  .announce-on-nav.is-open{
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1);
  }
  .announce-on-nav.is-closing{
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(.92);
  }

  /* æœ€å°åŒ–çŠ¶æ€ï¼šæ— å¤–æ¡†ï¼Œåªæ˜¾ç¤ºæ„Ÿå¹å·å›¾æ ‡ */
  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe{
    background: transparent; border: 0; box-shadow: none; padding: 0;
    inline-size: 36px; block-size: 36px; border-radius: 50%;
    display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer;
    opacity: 0; transform-origin: center;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(.86);
  }
  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe .icon{ width:22px; height:22px; }
  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe.is-open{
    opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1);
  }
  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe:hover .icon{ transform: scale(1.06); opacity: .95; }

  /* æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼ */
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
    .announce-on-nav{
      border-color:#294b73;
      background:
        linear-gradient(90deg,#3aa0ff 0%,#60efff 45%,#00f5a0 100%) top/100% 4px no-repeat,
        #0e2742;
      color:#e6f0ff;
    }
    .announce-on-nav a{ color:#ffb662; }
    .announce-on-nav .ann-close:hover{ background:rgba(255,255,255,.10); }
    .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe{ background: transparent; }
  }

  /* ç»Ÿä¸€çš„åŠ¨æ•ˆæ—¶é•¿/æ›²çº¿ï¼ˆå°Šé‡â€œå‡å°‘åŠ¨æ•ˆâ€ï¼‰ */
  @media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference){
    .announce-on-nav,
    .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe{
      transition: transform .18s ease, opacity .18s ease;
    }
  }

  /* å±•å¼€æ—¶ï¼Œå»æ‰æ­£æ–‡ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå—çš„é¡¶éƒ¨å¤–è¾¹è·ï¼ˆé¿å…çœ‹èµ·æ¥â€œç©ºä¸€æˆªâ€ï¼‰ */
  .ann-open #quarto-document-content > *:first-child,
  .ann-open main.content > *:first-child { margin-top: 0 !important; }
</style>

<script>
(() => {
  const VERSION = '2025-08-28-overlay-v3-anim';
  const KEY = 'announce:dismissed';
  const bar  = document.getElementById('announce');
  const pill = document.getElementById('ann-toggle');

  // å®šä½åˆ°å¯¼èˆªæ å‡ ä½•ä¸­å¿ƒ
  function navEl(){
    return document.getElementById('quarto-header')
        || document.querySelector('header.navbar')
        || document.querySelector('.navbar.navbar-expand')
        || document.querySelector('header.site-header');
  }
  function positionOverNavbar(){
    const nav = navEl();
    const rect = nav ? nav.getBoundingClientRect() : { top: 0, height: 96 };
    const y = rect.top + rect.height / 2;
    document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--ann-center-y', `${y}px`);
  }

  // â€”â€” åŠ¨ç”»è¾…åŠ© â€”â€” //
  function fadeIn(el){
    el.hidden = false;
    // å¼ºåˆ¶å›æµï¼Œç¡®ä¿è¿‡æ¸¡ä»åˆå§‹æ€å¼€å§‹
    void el.offsetWidth;
    el.classList.remove('is-closing');
    el.classList.add('is-open');
  }
  function fadeOut(el, after){
    el.classList.remove('is-open');
    el.classList.add('is-closing');
    // ç­‰å¾…è¿‡æ¸¡ç»“æŸå† hidden
    const done = () => {
      el.hidden = true;
      el.removeEventListener('transitionend', done);
      el.classList.remove('is-closing');
      if (after) after();
    };
    // è‹¥ç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®â€œå‡å°‘åŠ¨æ•ˆâ€ï¼Œtransition å¯èƒ½ä¸º 0ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ç›´æ¥æ‰§è¡Œ
    if (getComputedStyle(el).transitionDuration === '0s') {
      done();
    } else {
      el.addEventListener('transitionend', done);
    }
  }

  // åˆå§‹æ˜¾ç¤ºé€»è¾‘
  try {
    const dismissed = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
    if (dismissed !== VERSION){
      document.documentElement.classList.add('ann-open');
      positionOverNavbar();
      fadeIn(bar);
      pill.hidden = true; // æœ€å°åŒ–éšè—
    } else {
      document.documentElement.classList.remove('ann-open');
      bar.hidden = true;
      positionOverNavbar();
      fadeIn(pill);
    }
  } catch {
    positionOverNavbar();
    fadeIn(bar);
  }

  // å…³é—­ -> æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€å°åŒ–å›¾æ ‡ï¼ˆå¸¦ç¼©å°åŠ¨ç”»ï¼‰
  bar.querySelector('.ann-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.documentElement.classList.remove('ann-open');
    fadeOut(bar, () => {
      localStorage.setItem(KEY, VERSION);
      positionOverNavbar();
      fadeIn(pill);
    });
  });

  // ç‚¹å‡»æœ€å°åŒ–å›¾æ ‡ -> å±•å¼€ï¼ˆå¸¦æ”¾å¤§åŠ¨ç”»ï¼‰
  pill.addEventListener('click', () => {
    document.documentElement.classList.add('ann-open');
    fadeOut(pill, () => {
      localStorage.removeItem(KEY);
      positionOverNavbar();
      fadeIn(bar);
    });
  });

  // ä¿æŒå¯¹é½
  const nav = navEl();
  if (nav && 'ResizeObserver' in window) new ResizeObserver(positionOverNavbar).observe(nav);
  window.addEventListener('scroll', positionOverNavbar, { passive:true });
  window.addEventListener('resize', positionOverNavbar);
  window.addEventListener('load', positionOverNavbar);
  positionOverNavbar();
})();
</script>
